mapper.select: SELECT F.USER_ID, MAX(F.SEND_DATE) AS SEND_DATE, U.NAME, U.STATUS, F_LETTER_CNT(#{to_id},F.USER_ID) AS CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM( ( SELECT USER_ID, MAX(SEND_DATE) AS SEND_DATE FROM LETTER WHERE USER_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT USER_ID FROM LETTER WHERE TO_ID=#{to_id}) GROUP BY USER_ID ) UNION ( SELECT TO_ID AS USER_ID, MAX(SEND_DATE) AS SEND_DATE FROM LETTER WHERE TO_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT TO_ID FROM LETTER WHERE USER_ID=#{to_id}) GROUP BY TO_ID ) )) F, USERS U WHERE F.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND F.USER_ID NOT IN(SELECT BLOCKED FROM BLOCK WHERE USER_ID=#{to_id}) GROUP BY F.USER_ID, U.NAME, U.STATUS ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT L.*, U.NAME FROM LETTER L, USERS U WHERE L.USER_ID=U.USER_ID AND SEND_YN ='N' AND TO_DELETE='N' AND TO_ID =#{to_id} AND L.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT BLOCK.BLOCKED FROM BLOCK WHERE USER_ID = #{to_id}) AND ARRIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND GUBUN !='임시저장' ORDER BY ARRIVE_DATE DESC

WITH R AS ( SELECT * FROM LETTER_FROM_V WHERE TO_ID =#{to_id} AND USER_ID =#{user_id} AND GUBUN != '임시저장' OR TO_ID =#{user_id} AND USER_ID =#{to_id} AND GUBUN != '임시저장' ORDER BY ARRIVE_DATE DESC ) SELECT DISTINCT FIRST_VALUE(TO_ID) OVER(ORDER BY SEND_DATE DESC) AS USER_ID FROM R

WITH TEST AS (SELECT U.NAME AS TO_NAME, T.* FROM ( SELECT U.NAME, L.LETTER_ID, L.TO_ID, L.USER_ID, L.SEND_DATE, L.CONTENT, L.PHOTO, L.READ_DATE, L.TO_DELETE, L.FROM_DELETE, L.ARRIVE_DATE, L.SEND_YN, L.GUBUN, L.COR_YN FROM LETTER L, USERS U WHERE L.USER_ID = U.USER_ID) T, USERS U WHERE T.TO_ID=U.USER_ID AND GUBUN != '임시저장') SELECT * FROM TEST WHERE TO_ID =#{to_id} AND USER_ID =#{user_id} AND TO_DELETE='N' OR TO_ID =#{user_id} AND USER_ID =#{to_id} AND FROM_DELETE='N' ORDER BY ARRIVE_DATE DESC
